column6: THE NEW EPIC CONTINUES, "RINGS OF THE MANDARINS" - TONY STARK on a black op behind enemy lines that goes horribly wrong? He's fine with that. - When the enemy lines is "Svartalfheim, home of the Dark Elves" and MALEKITH THE ACCURSED wants to wear your skin, things get complicated. - Will Tony have to resort to a very special IRON MAN suit?
column8: | penciller (cover):Mike Del Mundo | writer:Kieron Gillen | artist:Luke Ross
